text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Risshō ni oite, mottomo jūyōna koto wa nanidearu ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā wa, watashi to anata gata to no ma no risshō-sha de ara reru. Kono kuruān ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, watashi ga anata gata soshite todoku kagiri no mono ni, sore ni yotte keikoku suru tamedearu. Anata gata wa (arrā no soto ni) hoka no kami ga aru koto o, shōgen dekiru no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa shōgen suru koto wa dekinai.'
